publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4886 Peter Peacock: The Draft Social Work Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Education Committee recommends that the draft Social Work Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Robert Brown*

S2M-4886 Peter Peacock: The Draft Social Work Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Education Committee recommends that the draft Social Work Inspections (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Robert Brown
